title: Which is better, TikTok or Dubsmash? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tiktok will be the winner  Lip-synchronizing application Dubsmash was near the very edge of death. After a concise snapshot of virality in 2015 close by Vine (R.I.P), Dubsmash was draining clients quicker than it could enroll them. The application let you pick a sound track like a rap tune or film statement and shoot a video of you claiming to state the words. In any case, there was no place in the application to post the recordings. It was a creation instrument like Hipstamatic, not a system like Instagram. There's an explanation we're just utilizing one of those today.  Both apps serves the same core feature. Both of them video making app where you can lipsync on audio. Dubsmash covers only a small area (Lipsync) and Tiktok covers so many categories like dance, Acting, Skill videos.

Dubsmash is better and this is why: Its way more original than TikTok because Dubsmash creates the dance.Dubsmash has people who can dance the right way unlike TikTok There are people on there who cant dance the right way.Dubsmash is just the O.G dance app from songs, dances, and effects.Dubsmash may not have special effects but that´s because its original and better, and its not a lip-syncing app its a dance app. TikTok is a lip-syncing app. So yes Dubsmash is Better than TikTok.
